column4: the official adobe flash plugin only works intermittently for me, is there an alternative?
can you give a PASTEBIN of the output of:  lsb_release -a; uname -a; dpkg -l | egrep 'flash|gnash|swf'
I may be able to help clear up your flash issue
sudo dpkg -P flashplugin-installer    will clean that up
clean what up? would you mind telling me whats wrong?
the flash package has left residual config
it's not showing. I suggest you enable the partner repo and you should see adobe-flashplugin, install that and it will give 64bit flash
sure. So you dont recommend any open source alternatives?
remember to remove the other flash plugin you have installed
if you manually copied a file to the plugins folder of your browser you will need to delete that too
thanks a lot for your help
